welcomePage.welcomeIntro: You are welcome to use this helper. This helper can help you to output your students' scores {0} according to individual students {1}, and you can also see the long-term learning trends of all students {2}. Usage is very simple, currently only Settings and Generate these two functions. Its source code is at {3}.
welcomePage.cSetup: In principle, you'll never use Settings except the first time, because for this helper, it doesnâ€™t know the meaning of ID. , Total and other special headers in your worksheet and you have to tell it in Settings. In addition, the worksheet {0} is used to generate a template for all grade entry worksheets. So, do not delete it but you can edit it.
welcomePage.cGenerate: From that page, you can generate a worksheet with a table for each monthly exam entry, and you can also generate a comparison of previous exams' results. The worksheet {0} will output the individual student's learning status, which can be printed and handed over to the student's parent; {0}_${1}$ will display a table with all the grades of all students in color so as to help the teacher to figure out which students need help and which students are suitable to be a tutor to help those need help.
welcomePage.noteIntro: Your settings are incomplete and the problems are listed as follows:

welcomePage.noTemplateSheet: You did not provide a template worksheet
welcomePage.noteAction: After reading the following instructions, please click the following button to enter the Settings page to make the necessary settings. Thank you.
welcomePage.notSupport: This app should be operated under Excel 2016 at least. Sorry, so you can currently only see this page.
welcomePage.lowerExcelApi: Since you are using Excel's ExcelApi that does not reach the minimum required version of this app, you cannot use this app. To use, Updating your Excel may be a way.
